course_name: Software II: Software Development and Design
course_description:
Data representation using hashing, search trees, and linked data structures; algorithms for sorting; using trees for language processing; component interface design; best practices in Java.
Prereq: 2221. Concur: 2321. Not open to students with credit for 2231.01.
course_prerequisites: Prereq: 2221. Concur: 2321. Not open to students with credit for 2231.01.
